history.content:
Review the process for creating an EECS DeCal here: https://eecs.berkeley.edu/resources/undergrads/decal

Course Proposal Form:

The course proposal form and related checklists have been updated. Make sure that you are using the most updated form. You can access the form under the required documents section and identify the latest version by referring to the bottom, right corner of the form, noting the “v.10.2018” footnote marker.

Student Facilitator Training: 
All student facilitators must complete the training requirement before submitting their proposal. Anyone listed as a student facilitator on the DeCal syllabus must complete the training requirement. If you have completed the training in the past, you do not need to complete it again. The Undergraduate Course Facilitator Training & Resources (UCFTR) program hosts training across each semester. 

 

Faculty Sponsor:

Academic Senate rules that faculty can only sponsor one decal each in a given semester (without the dean granting an exception).  It's student facilitator responsibility to flag that when they approach a professor as a potential sponsor of your decal. 

If you do not have a faculty letter of support, your DeCal will not be approved. Make sure that your faculty sponsor has signed your paperwork. 

 

Deadline:

All Spring 2020 DeCal proposals need to be delivered to the Chairs' Assistants no later than October 29, 2019. Late/incomplete submissions will not be accepted.
